titleStmt.title: Epithalamium vpon the all-desired nvptials of Frederike the fift, Prince Palatine of Rhene, chiefe elector, Duke of Bauier, and arch-sewer to the Romane Empire And Elizabeth, the onely daughter of Iames, by the grace of God, King of Great Britain, France and Ireland, Defender of the Faith, &c. VVritten by Augustine Taylor.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Augustine.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Samuel Rand, and are to bee sold by Edward Marchant, at his shop in Pauls church-yard, ouer against the crosse,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
